defined_text = {
	name = TUR_armenian_population_230
	text = {
		trigger = {
			230 = {
				check_variable = { TUR_armenian_state_level > 0 }
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_armenian_population_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_armenian_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_armenian_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_armenian_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_armenian_population_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_armenian_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_armenian_population_230_yes
	}
}

				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes

	name = TUR_greek_population_1035
	text = {
		trigger = {
			1035 = {
				check_variable = { TUR_greek_state_level > 0 }
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_greek_population_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_greek_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_greek_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_greek_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_greek_population_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_greek_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_greek_population_1035_yes
	}
}

					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_arab_population_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_arab_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_arab_population_1060_yes
	}

				check_variable = { TUR_arab_state_level > 0 }
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_arab_population_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_arab_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {

						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_arab_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_arab_population_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_arab_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}

	name = TUR_south_slavic_population_899_stability_factor

			353 = {
				check_variable = { TUR_kurdish_state_level > 0 }
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes

					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_kurdish_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_kurdish_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_kurdish_population_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_kurdish_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_kurdish_population_1025_yes
	}

						has_variable = TUR_georgian_population_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_georgian_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}

						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_georgian_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_georgian_population_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_georgian_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_georgian_population_1034_yes
	}

						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_turkish_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {

						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_turkish_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_turkish_population_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_turkish_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_turkish_population_355_yes
	}

	name = TUR_turkish_population_787
	text = {
		trigger = {
			787 = {
				check_variable = { TUR_turkish_state_level > 0 }
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_turkish_population_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_turkish_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_turkish_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_turkish_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_turkish_population_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_turkish_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_turkish_population_787_yes
	}
}

				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_azerbaijani_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_azerbaijani_population_818_stability_factor_yes
	}

defined_text = {
	name = TUR_konstantiniyye_vilayet_desc
	text = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = TUR_millet_system_description_selected }
		localization_key = TUR_konstantiniyye_vilayet_desc_yes
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = TUR_millet_system_description_selected } }
		localization_key = TUR_no_vilayet_desc
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_konstantiniyye_vilayet_centralization
	text = {
		trigger = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_konstantiniyye
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_vilayet_centralization }
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_konstantiniyye_vilayet_centralization_yes
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_konstantiniyye_vilayet_centralization_desc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_konstantiniyye
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_vilayet_centralization }
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_konstantiniyye_vilayet_centralization_desc_yes
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_konstantiniyye_vilayet_centralization_value
	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_variable = TUR_konstantiniyye_vc_effect
			check_variable = { TUR_konstantiniyye_vc_effect < 0 }
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_konstantiniyye_vilayet_centralization_value_yes
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_konstantiniyye_vilayet_separatist_sentiments
	text = {
		trigger = {
			347 = {
				TUR_state_has_minority = yes
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes
					TUR_state_has_minority_war_support_factor = yes
					TUR_state_has_minority_political_power_factor = yes
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_konstantiniyye_vilayet_separatist_sentiments_yes
	}
}

	text = {

		localization_key = TUR_selanik_vilayet_desc_yes
	}

		localization_key = TUR_no_vilayet_desc

	name = ottoman_selanik_vilayet_centralization
	text = {
		trigger = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_selanik
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_vilayet_centralization }
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_selanik_vilayet_centralization_yes
	}

	name = ottoman_serbia_vilayet_stability_factor
	text = {

			OR = {
				107 = { TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes }
				809 = { TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes }

				846 = { TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes }

	name = TUR_eflak_vilayet_desc
	text = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = TUR_millet_system_description_selected }
		localization_key = TUR_eflak_vilayet_desc_yes
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = TUR_millet_system_description_selected } }
		localization_key = TUR_no_vilayet_desc
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_eflak_vilayet_centralization
	text = {
		trigger = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_eflak
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_vilayet_centralization }
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_eflak_vilayet_centralization_yes
	}
}

	}

	}

	name = ottoman_transylvania_vilayet_centralization

		trigger = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_transylvania
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_vilayet_centralization }
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_transylvania_vilayet_centralization_yes
	}

		localization_key = TUR_carniola_vilayet_desc_yes
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = TUR_millet_system_description_selected } }
		localization_key = TUR_no_vilayet_desc
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_carniola_vilayet_centralization
	text = {
		trigger = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_carniola
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_vilayet_centralization }
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_carniola_vilayet_centralization_yes
	}
}

	name = ottoman_carniola_vilayet_centralization_desc

defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_carniola_vilayet_centralization_value
	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_variable = TUR_carniola_vc_effect
			check_variable = { TUR_carniola_vc_effect < 0 }
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_carniola_vilayet_centralization_value_yes
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_carniola_vilayet_separatist_sentiments
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				102 = {
					TUR_state_has_minority = yes
					TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
					OR = {
						TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_war_support_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_political_power_factor = yes
					}
				}
				1010 = {
					TUR_state_has_minority = yes
					TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
					OR = {
						TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_war_support_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_political_power_factor = yes
					}
				}
				736 = {
					TUR_state_has_minority = yes
					TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
					OR = {
						TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_war_support_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_political_power_factor = yes
					}
				}
				875 = {
					TUR_state_has_minority = yes
					TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
					OR = {
						TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_war_support_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_political_power_factor = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_carniola_vilayet_separatist_sentiments_yes
	}
}

					TUR_state_has_minority_war_support_factor = yes

				}
			}
		}

	}

				346 = { TUR_state_has_minority_political_power_factor = yes }
				911 = { TUR_state_has_minority_political_power_factor = yes }
				1033 = { TUR_state_has_minority_political_power_factor = yes }
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_konya_vilayet_political_power_factor_yes
	}
}

		localization_key = TUR_bitlis_vilayet_desc_yes
	}

		localization_key = TUR_no_vilayet_desc
	}

defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_bitlis_vilayet_separatist_sentiments
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				1022 = {
					TUR_state_has_minority = yes
					TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
					OR = {
						TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_war_support_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_political_power_factor = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_bitlis_vilayet_separatist_sentiments_yes
	}
}

			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_deir_ez_zor_vilayet_centralization_yes
	}

				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_vilayet_centralization }
			}
		}

	}

	name = ottoman_beirut_vilayet_separatist_sentiments

			OR = {
				553 = {
					TUR_state_has_minority = yes
					TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
					OR = {
						TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_war_support_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_political_power_factor = yes

						TUR_state_has_minority_war_support_factor = yes

defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_tunis_vilayet_665
	text = {
		trigger = {
			665 = {
				TUR_state_has_minority = yes
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes
					TUR_state_has_minority_war_support_factor = yes
					TUR_state_has_minority_political_power_factor = yes
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_tunis_vilayet_665_yes
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = TUR_algeria_vilayet_desc
	text = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = TUR_millet_system_description_selected }
		localization_key = TUR_algeria_vilayet_desc_yes
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = TUR_millet_system_description_selected } }
		localization_key = TUR_no_vilayet_desc
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_algeria_vilayet_centralization
	text = {
		trigger = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_algeria
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_vilayet_centralization }
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_algeria_vilayet_centralization_yes
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_algeria_vilayet_centralization_desc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_algeria
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_vilayet_centralization }
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_algeria_vilayet_centralization_desc_yes
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_algeria_vilayet_centralization_value
	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_variable = TUR_algeria_vc_effect
			check_variable = { TUR_algeria_vc_effect < 0 }
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_algeria_vilayet_centralization_value_yes
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_algeria_vilayet_separatist_sentiments
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				459 = {
					TUR_state_has_minority = yes
					TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
					OR = {
						TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_war_support_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_political_power_factor = yes
					}
				}
				460 = {
					TUR_state_has_minority = yes
					TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
					OR = {
						TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_war_support_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_political_power_factor = yes
					}
				}
				996 = {
					TUR_state_has_minority = yes
					TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
					OR = {
						TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_war_support_factor = yes
						TUR_state_has_minority_political_power_factor = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_algeria_vilayet_separatist_sentiments_yes
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_algeria_vilayet_stability_factor
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				459 = { TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes }
				460 = { TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes }
				996 = { TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes }
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_algeria_vilayet_stability_factor_yes
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_algeria_vilayet_war_support_factor

			OR = {
